00025 #include "NicEntry.h"

00029 
00038 class NicEntryDebug: public NicEntry
00039 {
00040   protected:
00042     int inCnt;
00043     
00045     int outCnt;
00046     
00048     std::vector<cGate* > freeInGates;
00049     
00051     std::vector<cGate* > freeOutGates;
00052

00055     cGate* requestInGate(void);
00056         
00058     cGate* requestOutGate(void);
00059         
00060   public:
00064     NicEntryDebug(bool debug) : NicEntry(debug), inCnt(0), outCnt(0) {};
00065

00071 
00073     virtual void connectTo(NicEntry*);
00074     
00076     virtual void disconnectFrom(NicEntry*);
